mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Miller, James W.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Miller, James W. Patient Age: 33. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound left hand phalangeal joint. Index finger. Amputation on the field through metacarpal bone. Surgeon unknown. . Location Wounded: Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Treatment: Simple dressings - cold water. Simple curate Sept 1 attacked with acute rheumatism. Sol [solution] iodide potassium vincoleric. Trasnferred to ward K under care of Dr. Shilling. . Result: Transferred to US Genl Hospital Parkersburg, VA [West Virginia] 1864/09/27.
